name: Myst IV: Revelation
description: In Myst IV: Revelation, the next chapter in the greatest adventure saga of all time, you'll travel through environments pulsing with life to unearth a treacherous scheme involving two of Myst's most sinister villains.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 32 MB 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 7172 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compliant audio device Additional Notes: Peripherals: Mouse, Keyboard
